original_text: The group of believers at Antioch sent Paul, Barnabas and the other men on their way. They travelled through Phoenicia and Samaria. They spoke to the believers in those places. They told them, ‘ Gentiles are also turning to God and they are believing in Jesus.’ The believers were all very happy to hear this news.
korean_text: 그들이 교회의 전송을 받고 베니게와 사마리아로 다니며 이방인들이 주께 돌아온 일을 말하여 형제들을 다 크게 기쁘게 하더라

sentences.original_text: The group of believers at Antioch
sent Paul, Barnabas and the other men on their way
sentences.korean_translation: 바울과 바나바와 다른 사람들을 길을 떠나보냈다

sentences.original_text: They travelled through Phoenicia and Samaria
They spoke to the believers in those places
Gentiles are also turning to God
and they are believing in Jesus
The believers were all very happy
